description: The Eyes Of Gruumsh fierce allies against formidable enemies or implacable op- “The cycle of my father’s people is a simple one. You kill, you get ponents dedicated to killing those the heroes love. better at killing, and you kill again. Break the cycle, and you die.” A character can choose this prestige class more than —Krusk once but must select a different hated enemy and start again at 1st level each time. description: The dread pirate prestige class can be used to represent any powerful individual with great nautical skill. A famous admiral and a ruthless but honest priva - teer might not differ in abilities, but they will certainly differ in outlook and demeanor.
name: Adaptation

description: Some of the most interesting adaptations for the dungeon delver prestige class involve associating it with a certain race. Although dwarves and gnomes are natural choices because of their ties with underground life, dungeon delvers of less obvious races such as humans, dark elves, and halﬂings are interesting as well because such characters offer something other than the stereotypical depiction of their race. The dungeon delver and the nightsong inﬁltrator (see page 62) also serve as interesting roguelike prestige classes that do not rely on the sneak attack ability and might serve as a model for making similar prestige classes in your own campaign.
name: Adaptation

description: d6. REQUIREMENTS To qualify to become a dungeon delver, a character must fulﬁll all the following criteria.
name: Hit Die
